        Add student to the table student Auto-commit by default : each add is effective
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • update

        public int update(Student student)
        Edit a student in the table student. Auto-commit by default : each update is effective
        Parameters:
        student - the student to update
        Returns:
        return the number of lines updated in the table

      • delete

        public int delete(Student student)
        Delete a student from the table student. If the student is associated to groups, the deletion won't be done Auto-commit by default: each deletion is effective
        Parameters:
        student - the student to delete
        Returns:
        return the number of lines deleted from the table

        Retrieve a student from the database using his id
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • get

        public Student get(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String password)
        Retrieve a student from the database using his name (first name and last name) and password
        Parameters:
        name - : the student's name (first name and last name) as written during creation
        password - : the student's password
        Returns:
        the retrieved student; null if there is no student with this id and password
